title: Divya Chandrika Haaram - Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: Plated with 22K Gold. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds
and Seed Pearls. Finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This modern Haaram features a graduated, crescent-shaped collar intricately studded with shimmering CZ diamonds. The central pendant showcases a traditional floral motif, incorporating Emerald and Ruby gemstones, enhanced by delicate seed pearls. The design balances contemporary aesthetics with traditional South Indian elements, making it a versatile piece.
colors: Predominantly gold with white diamonds. Accented with vibrant green from the Emerald
and soft cream from the Seed Pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for traditional events such as Seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree function.
description: This Divya Chandrika Haaram is a stunning fusion of modern design and traditional South Indian aesthetics. The meticulous craftsmanship, high-quality CZ diamonds, and vibrant gemstone accents ensure a dazzling look. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting brilliance, making it a cherished addition to your jewelry collection. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear.
